name: FormBuilder.Autocomplete
comment:
View of the autocomplete field, used to render it in the browser.

@docs default

values.name: default
values.type: List (FormBuilder.FieldBuilder.Attributes.AttributesModifier (FormBuilder.Autocomplete.Attributes.AutocompleteAttributes a msg) msg) -> Html.Html msg

name: FormBuilder.Autocomplete.Attributes

aliases.name: AutocompleteAttributes
aliases.type: { choices : Maybe.Maybe (List ( String, List a )) , choiceView : Maybe.Maybe (a -> String) , onSelect : Maybe.Maybe (a -> msg) , searchQuery : Maybe.Maybe String , focused : Bool , selectedElement : Maybe.Maybe a }

values.name: defaultAttributes
values.comment: Default attributes of the autocomplete field.

values.name: searchQuery
values.comment: Set the searchQuery of the autocomplete.
values.type: String -> FormBuilder.FieldBuilder.Attributes.FieldAttributes (FormBuilder.Autocomplete.Attributes.AutocompleteAttributes a msg) msg -> FormBuilder.FieldBuilder.Attributes.FieldAttributes (FormBuilder.Autocomplete.Attributes.AutocompleteAttributes a msg) msg

values.name: selectedElement
values.comment: Set the selected element of the attributes to the value of the autocomplete model.
values.type: { b | selectedElement : Maybe.Maybe Int, elements : List a } -> FormBuilder.FieldBuilder.Attributes.FieldAttributes (FormBuilder.Autocomplete.Attributes.AutocompleteAttributes a msg) msg -> FormBuilder.FieldBuilder.Attributes.FieldAttributes (FormBuilder.Autocomplete.Attributes.AutocompleteAttributes a msg) msg

values.name: selection
values.comment:
Set the required data of the autocomplete.
- choices are labelled list of the elements which have to be displayed.
- choiceView is a function, turning and element to a string.
- onSelect is the message which will be send after a selection in the autocomplete.
- searchQuery is the query entered by the user.
- focused is a bool, representing if the autocomplete is focused or not.
- formAttributes are the attributes of the field.
values.type: Maybe.Maybe (List ( String, List a )) -> (a -> String) -> (a -> msg) -> String -> Bool -> FormBuilder.FieldBuilder.Attributes.FieldAttributes (FormBuilder.Autocomplete.Attributes.AutocompleteAttributes a msg) msg -> FormBuilder.FieldBuilder.Attributes.FieldAttributes (FormBuilder.Autocomplete.Attributes.AutocompleteAttributes a msg) msg

name: FormBuilder.Autocomplete.Action

values.name: changeSelectedElement
values.comment: Changes the selected element in the autocomplete.
values.type: { b | selectedElement : Maybe.Maybe Int, elements : List a } -> Int -> { b | selectedElement : Maybe.Maybe Int, elements : List a }

values.name: deselectElement
values.comment: Removes the selected element from the autocomplete.
values.type: { b | selectedElement : Maybe.Maybe Int } -> { b | selectedElement : Maybe.Maybe Int }

values.name: selectElement
values.comment: Selects an element in the elements, and puts it as selectedElement in autocomplete.
values.type: a -> { b | selectedElement : Maybe.Maybe Int, elements : List a } -> { b | selectedElement : Maybe.Maybe Int, elements : List a }

values.name: selectedElement
values.comment: Returns the selected element from the autocomplete model.
values.type: { b | elements : List a, selectedElement : Maybe.Maybe Int } -> Maybe.Maybe a
